title: This may be a glitch
body:
my friend bought only one champion right? and so he has been getting some loot boxes every so often with this champion... these loot boxes yield more champions..... why you do dis to me rito!?!? why?!? I never get champs in my loot boxes is this some kind of algorithm that yields more champs if you have less?
http://s2.quickmeme.com/img/ee/eee3942adffdcd13d91c812f2a191ce2d65b88effd2e940d47a249c2aeed26ae.jpg
